content: Math 201: Advanced Calculus. Prerequisite: Math 102. Emphasis on multivariable integrals.

content: Bio 310: Genetics and Heredity. Lab required. Project on CRISPR gene editing.

content: CS 420: Machine Learning Applications. Focuses on neural networks and data pipelines.

content: Eng 150: British Literature Survey. Covers 18th century to modern era.

content: Hist 220: World Civilizations II. Medieval to early industrial periods. Group research project included.
